# Create
kubectl create -f example11.yaml 

# Get Pods
kubectl get pod

# Default conneccts to First container 
kubectl exec -it multicontainer-pod -- /bin/sh

# Connect to Producer Container and go to /var/log - You can see the data which is being generated by shell script
kubectl exec -it --container producer multicontainer-pod -- /bin/sh


# Connect to the Consumer container and go to /usr/share/nginx/html  - You will be able to see the data
kubectl exec -it --container consumer multicontainer-pod -- /bin/sh
